text: Uh, yeah, sure. Here you go. I don't understand why you pulled me over.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: You were clocked at 45 in a 30 zone, sir.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: 45? That's ridiculous! I was barely going over 35. This is a setup.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Sir, the radar doesn't lie. I have you on record.

text: Look, I'm late for a meeting. This is really going to mess up my day. Can't you just give me a warning?
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: I understand you're in a hurry, but speeding is dangerous. It puts yourself and others at risk. I'm going to have to write you a ticket.
speaker: SPEAKER_00

text: This is unbelievable. You cops are just out to get people.

text: Sir, I'm just doing my job. Please keep your hands on the steering wheel while I process this.
